short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds an option in right click menu for DinoPass.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily generate a password that's both secure and easy to remember.

1. Right Click
2. Select DinoPass
3. The password will be added to your clipboard

This is an unoffical extension. Please support the offical release at https://www.dinopass.com/
